original_text: But they understood none of these things. This saying was hidden from them, and they did not grasp what was said.
korean_text: 제자들이 이것을 하나도 깨닫지 못하였으니 그 말씀이 감취었으므로 그들이 그 이르신 바를 알지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: But they understood none of these things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 이런 것들을 전혀 이해하지 못했습니다.

sentences.original_text: This saying was hidden from them,
and they did not grasp what was said.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 하신 말씀을 알아듣지 못했습니다.
